definitions.definition: An oven or furnace or a heated chamber, for the purpose of hardening , burning, calcining or drying anything; for example, firing ceramics , curing or preserving tobacco , or drying grain.

main_definition: An oven or furnace or a heated chamber, for the purpose of hardening , burning, calcining or drying anything; for example, firing ceramics , curing or preserving tobacco , or drying grain.
